txt.en: Aggressive láthbears have been spotted in the Firien Wood and some have even ventured towards Gondorian settlements. These beasts should be dealt with for the safety of those who dwell near the Firien Wood.
You have defeated many láthbears in the Beacon Hills.
You have defeated many láthbears in the Beacon Hills.
Láthbears can be found around the Firien Wood in the Beacon Hills.\n\nYou should defeat láthbears.
Aggressive láthbears have been spotted in the Firien Wood, due to the recent enemy occupation of the Beacon Hills.
